_sText:
Aim_deagle_forestfortress This is a medium sized map located in a green and nice forest. Yes, this is a deagle map so the main weapond are not unexpected the desert-eagle. I made it for the deagle copetition pstar9 started, and this map will hopefully be in the tournament this sunday ( 20/9 or 21/9 I´m not sure) It was the first time I made a deagle map so I had some troubble with the layout from the beginning, but after a couple of drawings I got a pretty nice main idea. I spend alot of time at the enviroment and added alot of stuff around the map to rise the playing experience. cliffs,trees props and sound. And I think the final result turned out very well. I belive it would be nice to have this map as a normal "aim" map as well, with a buyzone at each spawn so you can play with all weaponds and not just the deagle. Tell me what you think, and I might be able to upload that version next week. I´m not going to write much more about the map now becouse I think it´s up to you to explore this map on youre own. When youre done please rate it and maybe leave a feedback or an small comment. Some main features
  • 3D skybox
  • Soundscapes
  • patched inferno brush models. (thansk natalya)
  • Custom meshes
  • nav.file (included in the rar.file)
Many thanks to Grönis and Dirtyboy for helping me with some small beta testing And special thanks to Shadow108 who came up whith the map name. Thanks for reading and downloading this map. Have fun! / Alex Don´t forget to rate and comment. ( I had to write it twise :D)
